doc:
Ted Sharks https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ted_Sharks 0 Ted Sharks (born January 25) is a Japanese film director, producer, screenwriter and editor. He is best known for writing and directing Hard to Say, Save the Underprivileged and An Ideal Marriage. Ted_Sharks ( born January_25 ) is a_Japanese_film_director , producer_,_screenwriter_and_editor . He is_best_known for writing and directing Hard to_Say , Save the_Underprivileged and An_Ideal_Marriage .
